item.description:
CONGRESSMAN LYNCH ANNOUNCES
TOWN HALL FORUM ON HEALTH CARE REFORM

Congressman Stephen F. Lynch invites constituents of the Ninth Congressional District to attend an open forum sponsored by Curry College on Thursday, August 27th to discuss health care reform. The forum will be held at the Alumni Recreation Center at Curry College from 6:00 -8:00 p.m.

WHO: Congressman Stephen F. Lynch

WHAT: Town Hall Forum

WHEN: Thursday, August 27th

TIME: 6:00 -8:00 p.m.

WHERE: Alumni Recreation Center
Curry College
1071 Blue Hill Avenue
Milton, MA

http://www.house.gov/...
item.name: US Rep. Lynch Health Care Meeting This Thursday
